mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INFO_TABLE VALUES('BO'|| TO_CHAR(SEQ_INFO.NEXTVAL, 'FM000'), #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{memberNo}, 'Y', 0)
mapper.select: SELECT I.INFO_PK ,I.TITLE ,I.CONTENT ,I.CREATE_DATE ,I.EDIT_DATE ,I.VIEW_COUNT ,M.MEMBER_NAME FROM INFO_TABLE I JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MEMBER_NO = I.MEMBER_PK) WHERE I.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY INFO_PK DESC
SELECT I.INFO_PK ,I.TITLE ,I.CONTENT ,I.CREATE_DATE ,I.EDIT_DATE ,I.VIEW_COUNT ,M.MEMBER_NAME FROM INFO_TABLE I JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MEMBER_NO = I.MEMBER_PK) WHERE INFO_PK = #{boardNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE INFO_TABLE SET (TITLE, CONTENT, EDIT_DATE) = (SELECT #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, SYSDATE FROM INFO_TABLE WHERE INFO_PK = #{boardNo}) WHERE INFO_PK = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY VALUES('BORE'|| TO_CHAR(SEQ_REPLY.NEXTVAL, 'FM000'), #{replyContent}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 'Y', #{memberNo}, #{forumNo})
mapper.select: SELECT M.MEMBER_NAME ,R.REPLY_NO ,R.REPLY_CONTENT ,R.CREATE_DATE FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MEMBER_NO = R.MEMBER_NO) WHERE R.FORUM_NO = #{boardNo} AND R.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY R.REPLY_NO ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE REPLY SET (REPLY_CONTENT, MODIFY_DATE) = (SELECT #{replyContent}, SYSDATE FROM REPLY WHERE REPLY_NO = #{replyNo}) WHERE REPLY_NO = #{replyNo}
